definitions: The action of looking through a collection of things, such as books in a library or items in a store, without a specific goal or intention to buy.
The action of looking at information on the internet.
The action of an animal feeding on leaves, twigs, or other high-growing vegetation.
examples: She enjoys browsing in antique shops on weekends.
He spent hours browsing the web for new recipes.
The deer were browsing in the forest at dawn.
